name: Averin's Quest
description:
Controls: Arrow keys for moving. Space for jump. Use the mouse in order to interact with the menu buttons.

Simple platformer game I created for a school project back in 2015. It may be a bit laggy and may have some minor bugs related with enemies as I didn't have much idea of what I was doing and it was all from scratch, but it's still playable with 20 different levels with some cool mechanics.
